name: SasuSaku Userstyle - Tumblr - Naruto - Starry Sky
description: ART IS NOT MINE - Gravitate by ~xxxDymexxx! The following userstyle for tumblr was (MOSTLY?) made by Sasucaek, better known as Strawbellies.
additional_info: ART IS NOT MINE - Gravitate by ~xxxDymexxx! --- The following userstyle for tumblr was (MOSTLY?) made by Sasucaek, better known as Strawbellies. SasuSaku in a starry background for your Tumblr Dash. --- I had limited screenshots to use, but there's plenty of options from icons and logos and such. MOST? Of the coding was done by me ok. MOST. Sob. MOST MOST MOST. --- There are a few known glitches and things, such as the hover permalink that I am aware of. The logo changes back to the normal tumblr logo on a few pages due to incompatibility (Doesn't look nice bro) like the settings page or help page. -- If the coding doesn't spread to one page of tumblr or something incredibly noticeable glitches, please send me an ask. -- Merry Christmas and Happy New Year SasuSaku Tag! -2012.
